feat(location): implement location-based ToDos using Nominatim API

- Added reverse geocoding functionality to convert user input into GPS coordinates using the Nominatim API.
- Integrated OkHttp for network requests, providing a reliable way to handle API interactions.
- Created LocationRepository interface with search method for querying locations.
- Implemented NominatimLocationRepository to interact with the Nominatim Search API and parse JSON responses.
- Developed LocationViewModel to manage location data and interactions.
- Updated AddToDo and EditToDo screens to include a reusable composable for location selection.
- Enhanced UI with a DropdownMenu for location suggestions when creating or editing ToDos.
- Ensured compatibility with sigcheck by modifying composable signatures to use a default LocationViewModel parameter.

BREAKING CHANGE: The signatures for AddToDo and EditToDo composables have been modified to include a default parameter for LocationViewModel.

feat(ui): implement LocationInputField composable for location selection

Created LocationInputField composable to allow users to input and select locations from suggestions. This includes an outlined text field for querying locations and a dropdown menu for displaying suggestions based on user input. Integrated state management for dropdown visibility and selection handling.

feat(map): add ListToDosViewModel parameter to MapScreen

Updated MapScreen composable to accept ListToDosViewModel as a parameter. This change allows the MapScreen to access and manage to-do list data, enhancing its functionality and integration within the app's navigation structure.

feat(location): implement NominatimLocationRepository for API integration

Developed NominatimLocationRepository to handle location search queries using the Nominatim API. This includes encoding the query, making network requests, and parsing JSON responses into a list of Location objects. Added error handling for network failures and JSON parsing issues.

feat(location): implement NominatimLocationRepository for API integration

Developed NominatimLocationRepository to handle location search queries using the Nominatim API. This includes encoding the query, making network requests, and parsing JSON responses into a list of Location objects. Added error handling for network failures and JSON parsing issues.

feat(location): implement LocationViewModel for location searching

Created LocationViewModel to manage location search functionality. This includes handling user queries, fetching location suggestions from the repository, and exposing them as state flows. Added a factory for ViewModel instantiation with a NominatimLocationRepository.

feat(location): add LocationRepository interface

Implemented the LocationRepository interface to define the contract for location searching functionality. This includes a search method that takes a query and provides success and failure callbacks for handling the results.

Add Location-based ToDos feature

The user can set a location for a ToDo when creating/editing it.
The Nominatim API is used to reverse geocode named locations to
coordinates.
A separate map view is available where ToDos with locations are
displayed as pins on the map.
The map view integrates with the Google Maps API to render maps and
manage locations.
